entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:14 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
